page.title: 14COMMUTERS/CIVIC BUILDINGS
page.content:
MOST OF THE PEOPLE THAT LIVE IN WALTHAMSTOW WORK OUT OF THE AREA. YOU CAN SEE THIS BY STANDING OUTSIDE THE {UNDERGROUND STATION AT BLACKHORSE RD. DURING THE RUSH HOUR.THE LOCAL {NEWSPAPERS}ARE THE{GUARDIAN}AND A FREE NEWSPAPER{THE YELLOW ADVERTISER.}BOTH ARE PRINTED WEEKLY
THIS AREA ALSO HAS THE CIVIC BUILDINGS OF WALTHAMSTOW WHICH INCLUDE THE{TOWN {HALL}(NOW USED AS THE MUNICIPAL OFFICES FOR THE L.B. OF WALTHAM FOREST;{THE COURT HOUSE;THE ASSEMBLY {ROOMS}AND THE ADJACENT MAJESTIC BUILDING WHICH IS ONE OF THE PRINCIPAL SITES OF THE{NORTH EAST LONDON {POLYTECHNIC.
